goliath-challenge.hebrew: אַתָּה בָּא אֵלַי בְּחֶרֶב וּבַחֲנִית... וְאָנֹכִי בָא אֵלֶיךָ בְּשֵׁם יְהוָה צְבָאוֹת
goliath-challenge.english: You come to me with sword and spear... but I come to you in the name of the LORD of hosts

shepherd-boy.context: David the youngest, keeping the sheep
shepherd-boy.hebrew: עוֹד שָׁאַר הַקָּטָן וְהִנֵּה רֹעֶה בַּצֹּאן
shepherd-boy.english: There remains yet the youngest, and behold, he is keeping the sheep

heart-after-god.english: A man after His own heart

psalm-23.english: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want

dancing-before-ark.context: David dancing as the Ark enters Jerusalem
dancing-before-ark.hebrew: וְדָוִד מְכַרְכֵּר בְּכָל עֹז לִפְנֵי יְהוָה
dancing-before-ark.english: David danced before the LORD with all his might

house-for-god.context: David's desire to build the Temple
house-for-god.hebrew: אָנֹכִי יוֹשֵׁב בְּבֵית אֲרָזִים וַאֲרוֹן הָאֱלֹהִים יֹשֵׁב בְּתוֹךְ הַיְרִיעָה
house-for-god.english: I dwell in a house of cedar, but the ark of God dwells in a tent

mighty-men.english: These are the names of the mighty men whom David had

broken-contrite.hebrew: לֵב נִשְׁבָּר וְנִדְכֶּה אֱלֹהִים לֹא תִבְזֶה
broken-contrite.english: A broken and contrite heart, O God, you will not despise
